name: AI'm the King of Monsters...without my crown
name_original: AI'm the King of Monsters...without my crown
description:
Slide your way to victory in kAIju the thrilling game of destruction and reclamation of the crown! Play as a Kaiju, who has lost its crown and must traverse a destroyed city landscape to get it back. Challenge yourself to navigate the treacherous terrain by sliding through buildings, avoiding obstacles, and keeping an eye on the level-timer. Show who reigns supreme and claim back your crown!

Gameplay
  • free gameplay
  • 3D world in top-down view
  • use your beam to explore the world
  • find the lost crown
  • destroy buildings
  • race against the clock - can you beat your own highscore?
Credits
  • Leo - Programming, Shader, Sound & Music, Animation, Lighting
  • Julian - Game Design, UI Design, Level Design
  • Stephan - Props, Environment, Lighting, AI-Image-Generation, Character Modeling, Rigging and Animation
  • Leander - Gameplay Programming, Level Design, Game Design
